languages.text: "А ты правда думаешь, что все так просто?" {n}Мелькает кончик языка — есть что-то беспокойное, почти компульсивное в том, как капитан облизывает губы.{/n} "Тогда ты тупее огрина. Не забивай голову — все равно ты считай что ее лишил{mf|ся|ась}".

"And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."
languages.original_text: "А ты правда думаешь, что все так просто?" {n}Мелькает кончик языка — есть что-то беспокойное, почти компульсивное в том, как капитан облизывает губы.{/n} "Тогда ты тупее огрина. Не забивай голову — все равно ты считай что ее лишил{mf|ся|ась}".

traits.locale_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

"And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

languages.text: «¿De verdad crees que es así de simple?». {n}Sargona se lame los labios con ansia, casi de forma compulsiva.{/n} «Entonces eres más tont{mf|o|a} que un ogrete. No te molestes en darle vueltas; pronto lo hará tu cabeza».
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad crees que es así de simple?». {n}Sargona se lame los labios con ansia, casi de forma compulsiva.{/n} «Entonces eres más tont{mf|o|a} que un ogrete. No te molestes en darle vueltas; pronto lo hará tu cabeza».

languages.text: “你真以为事情这么简单吗？”{n}萨戈纳焦虑地舔着嘴唇，几乎像是条件反射一般。{/n}“如果你真这么想，那你恐怕比欧格林还蠢。算了，别再为难你那颗可怜的小脑袋了，反正它马上就要落地了。”
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: “你真以为事情这么简单吗？”{n}萨戈纳焦虑地舔着嘴唇，几乎像是条件反射一般。{/n}“如果你真这么想，那你恐怕比欧格林还蠢。算了，别再为难你那颗可怜的小脑袋了，反正它马上就要落地了。”

languages.text: « Et vous, vous croyez vraiment que les choses sont aussi simples ? {n}rétorque Sargona en se passant nerveusement la langue sur les lèvres en un geste compulsif.{/n} Alors, c'est que vous êtes plus stupide qu'un ogryn. Mais ne vous mettez pas martel en tête pour autant, vous êtes sur le point de la perdre, de toute façon. »
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous, vous croyez vraiment que les choses sont aussi simples ? {n}rétorque Sargona en se passant nerveusement la langue sur les lèvres en un geste compulsif.{/n} Alors, c'est que vous êtes plus stupide qu'un ogryn. Mais ne vous mettez pas martel en tête pour autant, vous êtes sur le point de la perdre, de toute façon. »

languages.text: 「それがそんなに簡単だと思っているのか？」{n}サルゴナは不安そうに、ほとんど衝動的に自分の唇をなめる。{/n}「そうであれば、お前はオグリンより頭が悪いな。お前の哀れな小さな頭を混乱させることはない―どうであれ、お前はそれを失うのだから」
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: 「それがそんなに簡単だと思っているのか？」{n}サルゴナは不安そうに、ほとんど衝動的に自分の唇をなめる。{/n}「そうであれば、お前はオグリンより頭が悪いな。お前の哀れな小さな頭を混乱させることはない―どうであれ、お前はそれを失うのだから」

languages.text: "Bu kadar basit olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun?" {n}Sargona, neredeyse dürtüsel olarak ve endişeyle dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "O hâlde Ogrinlerden daha kalın kafalısın. O gelişmemiş kafanı boşuna yorma, zaten birazdan paramparça olacak."
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar basit olduğunu mu düşünüyorsun? {n}Sargona, neredeyse dürtüsel olarak ve endişeyle dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "O hâlde Ogrinlerden daha kalın kafalısın. O gelişmemiş kafanı boşuna yorma, zaten birazdan paramparça olacak."

languages.text: "Und dachtet Ihr wirklich, es wäre so einfach?" {n}Sargona leckt sich ängstlich, ja beinahe zwanghaft die Lippen.{/n} "Dann seid Ihr dümmer als ein Ogryn. Zerbrecht Euch nicht Euren kleinen Kopf ... Ihr werdet ihn ohnehin verlieren."
languages.original_text: "And do you really think it's all so simple?" {n}Sargona licks his lips anxiously, almost compulsively.{/n} "Then you are thicker than an Ogryn. Don't trouble your sorry little head — you are about to lose it regardless."

traits.locale_text: "Und dachtet Ihr wirklich, es wäre so einfach?" {n}Sargona leckt sich ängstlich, ja beinahe zwanghaft die Lippen.{/n} "Dann seid Ihr dümmer als ein Ogryn. Zerbrecht Euch nicht Euren kleinen Kopf ... Ihr werdet ihn ohnehin verlieren."
